A white gorilla-like creature is hiding in the woods, only to be pursued by scientists hoping to discover if this creature is the missing link between mankind and the great apes. You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page. In addition to the formats listed to the left, this film is available as: Theora video, Vorbis audio, OGM container, 320x240 at 29.97fps (click here, 402 MB) Theora video, Vorbis audio, Matroska container, 320x240 at 29.97fps (click here, 400 MB)
